text: Watch the Ride is a compilation album made by Zinc and released by Harmless in 2007. == Track listing == == Personnel == === Musicians === * Zinc - Mixed By * Dynamite MC - Vocals * Eksman - Vocals * Stamina - Vocals === Production === * Zinc - Compiled By, Producer * Gavin Fraser - Project Co-ordinator == Other websites == * Watch the Ride on MySpace * Watch the Ride on Discogs Category:Compilation albums Category:2007 albums
title: Watch the Ride
